predicate.note: Frames file for 'trample' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: passive
example.text: After *trace* being trampled *trace* in Tuesday's selling stampede, the Nasdaq over-the-counter market dusted itself off and moved on in moderate trading.

example.name: active and prepositional
example.text: Mary routinely tramples on John's feelings.
